casebody.data:
The City of Conyers v. Smith & Lifsey. There was no abuse of discretion in granting the interlocutory injunction. June 18, 1894.

Argued at the last term.

Injunction. Before Judge Bichard H. Clark. Bock-dale county. December 27, 1893. G. W. Gleaton and J. R. Maddox, for plaintiff in error. J. N. Glenn, contra.

Judgment affirmed.
